alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone; Fulton; Izard; Marion; Newton; Randolph; Searcy; Sharp; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 02 at 6:23PM CDT until May 02 at 9:20PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Randolph County in eastern Arkansas... Baxter County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Boone County in north central Arkansas... Fulton County in north central Arkansas... Izard County in north central Arkansas... Marion County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Central Sharp County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Stone County in north central Arkansas... * Until 920 PM CDT. * At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Mountain Home, Cherokee Village, Bull Shoals, Melbourne, Salem in Fulton County, Marshall, Yellville, Ash Flat, Jasper, Horseshoe Bend, Gassville, Calico Rock, Flippin, Highland in Sharp County, Mammoth Spring, Lakeview in Baxter County, Hardy, Oxford, Norfork and Salesville. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Boone; Fulton; Izard; Marion; Newton; Randolph; Searcy; Sharp; Stone
